sections.heading: Students; equal privileges.No person shall be deprived of the privileges of this institution because of age, sex, color or nationality
sections.text: SourceLaws 1869, § 18, p. 177;R.S.1913, § 7097;C.S.1922, § 6729;C.S.1929, § 85-115;R.S.1943, § 85-116.AnnotationsThis section does not create a property interest suf
